mapper.select: SELECT eh.student_id, eh.exam_id, eh.student_score, et.course_id, ct.course_name, ut.user_name FROM exam_history_table eh, exam_table et, course_table ct, user_table ut WHERE eh.student_id= '${studentId}' AND eh.exam_id= et.exam_id AND et.course_id= ct.course_id AND eh.student_id= ut.user_id

SELECT eh.student_id, eh.exam_id, eh.student_score, et.course_id, ct.course_name, ut.user_name FROM exam_history_table eh, exam_table et, course_table ct, user_table ut WHERE et.course_id= ${courseId} AND eh.exam_id= et.exam_id AND et.course_id= ct.course_id AND eh.student_id= ut.user_id
